name: CreateSurveyQuestion
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Surveys:Create`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AllowMultipleAnswers": true,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "BlobID": "aeefe4f0-b2cb-4259-8524-b1bb93d1a3bf",
  "DataType": 8,
  "Description": "string",
  "DisplayType": "string",
  "InputHint": "string",
  "MaximumDate": "2025-01-21",
  "MaximumLength": 123,
  "MaximumValue": 123.456,
  "MinimumDate": "2025-01-21",
  "MinimumLength": 123,
  "MinimumValue": 123.456,
  "OptionalAnswers": {
    "key": "string"
  },
  "Remark": "string",
  "Required": true,
  "StoreAnswerOnContextCustomField": true,
  "SurveyContextCustomFieldID": 123,
  "SurveyID": 123,
  "Text": "string"
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/CreateSurveyQuestion

B.name: BackendID
B.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

B.name: BlobID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Blob`

B.name: DataType
B.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - String
* `1` - Bool
* `2` - Integer
* `3` - Decimal
* `4` - Enum
* `5` - Text
* `6` - DateTime
* `7` - Date
* `8` - Blob

B.name: DisplayType
B.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

B.name: InputHint
B.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

B.name: SurveyContextCustomFieldID
B.description:
A custom field that is available from the SurveyContext.
If context for example is `User`, all custom fields of the user are available.
If context for example is `Order`, all custom fields from the order and customer (user) on the order are available.

NOTE THAT this value cannot be update. If this question is based upon the custom field, any changes to the markup are rejected.

NOTE THAT any security settings on the custom field are ignored. 

NOTE THAT when this value is set, the markup of the custom field is copied as markup for the survey question, and the response data is saved within the survey.
If the value also needs to be stored on the context entity self (e.g. order, user, etc), the setting `StoreAnswerOnContextCustomField` needs to be set.
When `StoreAnswerOnContextCustomField` is set to true, changes to the custom field itself will also be blocked while the survey is active.

This is the ID of a `CustomField`

B.name: SurveyID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Survey`

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

E.name: ExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

E.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
E.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

E.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
E.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

C.name: ID
C.description: This is the ID of a `SurveyQuestion`
